mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Amended Consent Agreement, Pennsylvania Association for Retarded Children v. Commonwealth of Pennsylvania

mods:name.mods:namePart: Detre Library & Archives, Heinz History Center

mods:mods.mods:abstract: A copy of the amended consent agreement in the civil action filed by PARC. The agreement guarantees the right to education for children with developmental and intellectual disabilities under the equal protection clause of the 14th Amendment to the U.S. Constitution.

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Bob Nelkin Collection of ACC-PARC Records

mods:relatedItem.mods:note: II. State School and Hospital (SSH) and Interim Care Committee Records 1972-1997
Bob Nelkin Collection of ACC-PARC Records, 1953-2000, MSS 1002 , Detre Library and Archives, Senator John Heinz History Center
